text: (ai rasool) tum saaph kah do ki hamaare paravaradigaar ne to tamaam badakaariyon ko khvaah (chaahe) zaahiree ho ya baatinee aur gunaah aur naahaq jyaadatee karane ko haraam kiya hai aur is baat ko ki tum kisee ko khuda ka shareek banao jinakee unase koee daleel na hee naazil pharamaee aur ye bhee ki be samajhe boojhe khuda par bohataan bodhon
